Content: Commandant, I'm here.
Summer? I love the warm feeling... But I'll always have this warm feeling as long as I'm with everyone in Gray Raven. What about you, Commandant? Do you feel the same?

Feeling hot? Well... I think there are chilled watermelon and cold drinks over there. Liv should also have some things to cool you down. No, I can't do that. You would be frostbitten if I cool you off.
Whew... Maybe I can have some ice cream to cool down...
There seems to be a grill over there. It's nice to have a barbecue in an outdoor vacation like this, right? But Liv told me to be careful with it... I wonder what she meant...
Commandant, not sure if you notice it. The footprints we left when we set foot on this island were washed away by the sea... But the sea will remember them, and so will I.
Have you got a plan for our holiday, Commandant?
I'll be here for the time being, Commandant.
Is there anything I can help with, Commandant?
I had scanned the entire island before we landed. It's completely safe. The only hidden danger on this island is... that grill over there.
You also noticed the stage, Commandant? There are instruments on it. It's said that they were left for the visitors. Would you like to give them a try?
This island is warm enough even though it's isolated.

Me? If I can, I would like to bring a coconut back and see if I can plant it. Not sure what kind of coconut tree it would grow into in the space... No, of course I won't plant it directly in our lounge.
I feel... secure. The wind, the sunshine, and the warm sand will always make me feel relaxed... Do you feel the same, Commandant?
I'll remember this holiday we spend together, Commandant.
Goodbye, Commandant. I'll always be here.
Hi, Commandant.
In my memory, summer is always full of suffocating dust or a rain that won't stop for dozens of days. It's never this clear and bright. And most importantly, it's comfortable here.
Have you watched the Summer Brawl before? It is an anime from the Golden Age. I think it's a perfect fit for this happy and relaxing time.
I'm already very happy to be able to pass a peaceful summer.

Look! Is that a seagull? I only saw its illustration before, but I can still recognize it just like that. It must be wonderful to fly freely between the sky and the sea... This is, of course, one of my wishes as well.
I actually had a horrible first impression on the sea, but now I finally get the chance to look at it quietly... What's on the other side of the sea?
Go and have a look. What you see is what I want to see.
Goodbye, Commandant.
Hmm... What's up, Commandant?
Spring, summer, fall, and winter are all good seasons to take a sleep... Hmm? You feel the same?
Do you like this season? It is a sleepy season... Hmm? No, I don't want to go anywhere else. It's comfortable here. You go for me...
At least we have some great sunshine here, right?
I checked the coastline, but today is the first time that I get to relax like this... What? We are on holiday? Then let me take a nap first...
Speaking of which, the beach chair is perfect to nap on, especially in the sea wind... Do you want to give it a go?
Hmm, Kamui has been asking me to play with him in the sea... What? You haven't seen him? Thank God...
Good night... No, see you.
Hello, Commandant.
In my memory, the sea means more dangerous missions, but faith and purpose are like the rocks. They are unshakable...
How do you feel about the sea? It won't stay calm like this forever. It can be turbulent and terrifying... But will you still feel the same way you do when it's like that?
I miss the sea so bad.
About the frames... Do you mind it? They are part of me, but I prefer to spend my holiday in a more relaxing way.
For the Purifying Force, the brief moment of standby is our holiday... What about the Task Force? You don't have much time off, do you? Commandant?
I'll be here watching, Commandant. Both the sea and you.
See ya, Commandant.
Hey! Commandant! Nice to see you again!
Commandant! There! Did you see the snack stand over there? Yeah, that thing called hamburger... Oh, it's fast food, right? It smells so good... I wonder how it tastes.
Kowloong has so many delicious foods in summer! The sweet soup, the bean jelly, the fruits, and the ice bowl. I've heard of the ice bowl, but I never had the chance to try it...
I've got to take you to try Kowloong's summer snacks if we have the time!
I remember seeing the sea on the Nighter every day. Or the sea was all that I could see... Sounds confusing, doesn't it? Anyways, I love the sea here!
By the way, the stars in the night at sea are different from what we see in Babylonia. You haven't seen it before, right? Commandant? Let's look at the stars together at night!
Commandant, promise you'll take me when you go to the sea.
Bye, Commandant.
Ha! There you are.

My experience tells me that there are a few Corrupted hidden in that beach over there. And I wouldn't be surprised if some Ascendants suddenly come down from the sky... Yeah, that look. You don't need to suppress your nervousness. It's okay. I understand.
Commandant, get me a cold drink over there. You can get yourself one too. But don't get the wrong one. For the record, I have no experience in rescuing people who drink the cooling liquid by mistake.
The island is perfect for holiday. Plus, it's not boring here.
When was the last time when the sea, the summer, and you were together? You should remember, right? Well... You'd better remember.
Sometimes I wonder if we should change our clothes, or coatings, according to the season. After all, summer is not a calm season, right?
You'll have to make some sacrifice if you want to share this shade with me... Think about it.
Hmm? Are you leaving already?
Hello, Conductor.
Only the smell of the sea can bring our souls back. I think you can feel it too, right? Conductor? The wind comes from the sea...
Maybe we will only remember the summer we spent together when the horrible storm has passed and the sun casts its light on the ground.
The storm has passed, so we can enjoy the sunshine on the island.
Yes, of course, we've all been on the stage and off the stage. I just miss this feeling. But these instruments... feel so strange.
Would you like to hear something? Maybe I can play something for you. But most of the ball music can't be performed by one person... Would you like to join me, Conductor?
A stage that I can't hide from. A stage that makes me stay.
Until then, Conductor.
Hello, Commandant. Is there anything I can help with?
Speaking of which, we haven't made time to have some rest for a long time. "Rest and rejuvenate is also a tactic." I remember that's what the instructors told us in F.O.S.
If the holiday lasts forever, then I'm afraid it will become just like work, right? This is exactly why this holiday is so precious.
I'll be around anytime if you want some rest.
The unexpected holiday caught me off guard. I don't have any plans yet... What about you, Commandant? Any suggestions?
...Oh, sorry, I was lost in thought. I didn't notice that you were calling me. Sometimes I would empty my mind like this when I have the time. It's a good way to relax. You should try, Commandant.
Planning holidays for you and yourself is part of your duty as a commandant and captain.
Goodbye, Commandant.
What? Are you starting to enjoy the holiday?
This is a nice place to take a holiday... Would you like to lie down a bit here? Just relax. You're having a holiday.
...I'm good, sitting here and enjoying the sea wind. If you want some food, there seem to be some snacks over there, but I'm not sure how it tastes.
I'm curious about where the stage gets its power. I bet it's not some mysterious summer power...
Me? For me, it's not whether I like it or not. It's just that I feel calm staring at the sea. And it's a good time killer as well.
You are so strange. It's your holiday, but you're worrying about other people... I know. I'm fine. I can be better if you want.
You can take this holiday as our holiday, because that is what I think.
Nothing else? Fine.
Oh, you're here.
Why am I here, you ask? What if I said it's to oversee the United Command Bureau's work? What's your take?
—Relax, it may be called "supervision," but it's really just a friendly check-in.
I'll be sticking around, so no dodging me, okay?
Happy New Year, Commandant.
Options: ['What are you doing here, Lucia?', 'Care to try some local delicacies?', 'Goodbye']

Content: Today marks the start of the New Year, a day we're supposed to relax. Liv and I paid a visit to your lounge this morning, but you were already out.
Lee figured you'd either be networking with fellow commandants at the Bureau or honing your skills at the range. Having checked the range, I thought I'd come here to check.
Nothing urgent. Tonight, Liv, Lee, and I plan to review Gray Raven's yearly changes. Naturally, you're essential, Commandant.
It's not about discussing tactics. It's a rare chance for Gray Raven folks to chill and chat. Liv and I will prep some snacks ahead of time.
I could've messaged you via the terminal, but inviting you in person seems more... ceremonial? Anyway, look forward to it, Commandant.
Options: ['What are you doing here, Lucia?', 'Care to try some local delicacies?', 'Goodbye']

Content: Thanks, Commandant, but no need. I'm just a bit curious about the recipes. Wish I could take some cooking lessons if I get the chance.
Recently, I realized that more seasoning doesn't necessarily make a dish tastier. But putting that insight into practice is gonna take more work.
When I get confident in my cooking, you'll be the first to taste it, Commandant. I promise.
Options: ['What are you doing here, Lucia?', 'Care to try some local delicacies?', 'Goodbye']

Content: Alright, Commandant, you carry on.
...Happy New Year.
I tried kite-making as a kid. Although I managed to create one, Murray wasn't free to play outside like other kids.
Seeing all these materials and samples here kinda makes me nostalgic.
...You're thinking of giving it a shot? I'm game, but the weather Babylonia has been snowy lately. Not exactly ideal for kite-flying.
Good point. There's no rush. And it's not like we'll nail it on our first try. But I'll stick with you until we get it just right.
Yes, it's my day off, so I'm just wandering about. Don't get it twisted, I didn't come here just to find you.
Chatted with Murray this morning. On my way back to the lounge, I thought of someone who's all work and no play, so I decided to swing by.
Knew I'd find you here. I mean, you remind everyone else to take a break today, but here you are.
...Just out for a walk...? Let's assume you're being honest.
Yeah.
Seen the first snow of the new year yet, Commandant?
Options: ['Happy New Year, Liv.', "How's your fortune today, Liv?", 'Goodbye']

Content: Happy New Year, Commandant. Oh, I should've been the one to say it first...
Commandant, you can't be frowning right from the start of the year. Even at the squad's late-night get-togethers recently...
I'm aware you're juggling a lot, Commandant. But remember what Lucia said? As long as we stick together, there's nothing we can't overcome.
If things get too much to handle, feel free to lean on me more. I'm set on being more reliable this year.
That's the smile we're all hoping to see. Keeping you at ease is everyone's unspoken hope.
Options: ['Happy New Year, Liv.', "How's your fortune today, Liv?", 'Goodbye']

Content: Oops, hit a button on the device by mistake. Did you catch that, Commandant? Silly me...
The oracle says, "Fluky". Advisable for a big cleanup, inadvisable for... wanting it all. Guess it's true, greed gets you nowhere.
So today, from now on, I will just focus on what's in front of me—the snowscape and everyone around.
Options: ['Happy New Year, Liv.', "How's your fortune today, Liv?", 'Goodbye']

Content: Alright, Commandant, see you later.
...Why do you look so surprised?
Options: ['What are you doing here?!', 'I never pegged you as someone into bamboo gazing.', 'Goodbye']

Content: Isn't New Year's the perfect time for connecting with loved ones in your book?
Or did I get you all wrong, and you're not expecting any of this at all?
There's nothing to be nervous about. I've got my power under control for now. No plans to sink this human ark today.
...A scarf? Had nothing ready, so this is your New Year's gift? I didn't come to ask for anything, you know.
But... even if you have your choices and I have mine, I still cherish the freedom to occasionally defy fate.
Options: ['What are you doing here?!', 'I never pegged you as someone into bamboo gazing.', 'Goodbye']

Content: No. It's just that everything here has this "enhanced" feel to it. The plants, the weather... they're different from what you'd find on the surface.
Try to remember how they feel. Next time, maybe during a snowfall, if I come across a bamboo grove, I'll bring you along.
Then you'll see what I mean by "different."
Options: ['What are you doing here?!', 'I never pegged you as someone into bamboo gazing.', 'Goodbye']

Content: You head off. When I need to find you, I know how to track you down.
Good day, Commandant—and a Happy New Year to you.
Options: ['Interested in fireworks?', 'Keeping busy during these holidays?', 'Goodbye']

Content: Karenina used to have me test some of her explosive inventions. One was pretty much like fireworks.
It's not ground-fired, though. Karenina launches them, then I trigger them with my arrows.
In order to observe the range, Karenina added bright-colored powder. Although it's for weapon testing, I can't deny that the blasts are as beautiful as fireworks.

If you're interested, Commandant, I can recreate that colorful blaze with my arrows, festival or not. Of course, I'll ask Karenina to limit the powder amount to serve purely for the purpose of spectacle.
Options: ['Interested in fireworks?', 'Keeping busy during these holidays?', 'Goodbye']

Content: As the captain of the Purifying Force, I need to be on standby for duty. But there haven't been any assignments lately, so it's kinda like downtime.
But in my spare time, I do some praying. After all, it's a time of renewal, right?
Plus, with Babylonia scheduled for snowfall these days, the snowy scenery itself brings back memories worth a prayer or two.
Options: ['Interested in fireworks?', 'Keeping busy during these holidays?', 'Goodbye']

Content: See you, Commandant.
Ah, Commandant! Happy New Year!
Options: ["What's Pulao scribbling over there?", 'Are you not taking the day off?', 'Goodbye']

Content: Oh, this? I was just... sketching something for fun!
It's definitely not because it's too messy to show!
Ugh, you saw... Actually, I found some ink and thought I'd show off my calligraphy...
Who knew Calligraphy was as tough as math... I've gotta practice more when I get back. If it goes well, maybe I'll gift you a handwritten spring couplet next year!
Options: ["What's Pulao scribbling over there?", 'Are you not taking the day off?', 'Goodbye']

Content: Taking the day off? Absolutely! Kowloong is buzzing during these special festival days. The streets are brimming with delicious treats and fun activities!
Me? I've got to be responsible during working hours! Besides, the overtime pay during the festival...
Ahem, in any case, I need to focus on my work so everyone in Kowloong can enjoy the holiday. I won't lose sight of that!
Hey, the festivities in Kowloong aren't over yet. If you've got some time, Commandant, how about joining me for a trip there?
Options: ["What's Pulao scribbling over there?", 'Are you not taking the day off?', 'Goodbye']

Content: You carry on, Commandant.
Oh?
I just figured it'd be a local delicacy worth bringing along when I report back to Jamilah.
Depending on the train's region and season, local festive items like these really catch on.
Let me have a taste before deciding? Fair point.
...Hmm, so sweet.
...Happy New Year. What's the proper etiquette for this moment, according to Kowloong tradition?
Just enjoy the vibe, you say? Got it.
Next time you visit the Akdilek Commercial Alliance, I'll treat you to a special vibe. Consider it a return gift, no, an invitation.
That's about it.
I finally meet you again, Commandant.
The security around here is not guaranteed, but this place has good lighting and offers a nice view. The fountain over there...
Commandant, do you want to toss a coin into the fountain and make a wish there? I think I've heard about a tradition like that... What kind of wish do you want to make?
I wish I could learn to cook delicious food for everyone... Commandant, why are you giving me that look?
Even during my downtime, I still always think about everyone in Gray Raven first and what we can do together.
We've become like a family now, after all. Sometimes, I worry that it might be a burden for others, though.
With that being said, I still want to ask for your help in considering it. But before we dive into that, shall we head to the restaurant first?
I'm always here, Commandant.
Commandant, what's next?
From here, you can have a clear view of the sea below... and even every subtle wave on the sea surface.
It's like it has become part of the sky, a completely different view from what we've seen in Babylonia... Do you feel the same, Commandant?
I imagine myself becoming the sky, the sea, or as free as the wind... Ah, I guess in the end, I still want to be with you and everyone else.
I don't have many childhood memories of summer, but the first thing that comes to mind is seeing a mama sheep and her lamb on a distant hillside during a family trip.
Later on, the change of seasons became a blur, and people didn't really have time to pay attention to the scenery around them.
Let's create more memories of summer together, Commandant.
Let me know if there's anything I can help you with, Commandant!
Do you have any plan for your vacation, Commandant?
In order to ensure a safe flight, many parameters must be carefully adjusted.
Moreover, the island must be designed to adapt to various weather conditions, and the routes must be strategically planned to minimize the impact of extreme weather...
There are people in charge of this? I know, but when it comes to your safety, I can only rest assured if I go through the maintenance process myself.
Feelings about summer? Nothing particularly noteworthy. After all this time fighting on the surface, I don't really feel the change of seasons.
But both Lucia and Liv seem excited about it. After all, summer is often associated with... precious memories.
So, if you've got some free time, want to do something together?
The weather forecast shows it will be sunny. Enjoy the rest of your vacation, Commandant.
Want to relax for some time, Commandant?
If you're looking for some good spots where you won't be bothered, I've got some advice for you.
You know, for a sniper like me, finding the most hidden spot in any area... is a walk in the park.
No need, huh? Well, I can also tell you about the best place to hang out, the best place to eat, and the best place to read. Trust me, they've all got stellar reviews.
Things I want to do in summer? Um... you probably already have the answer in your mind before even asking me, don't you?
But... I just had a good rest and I'm totally ready to do something else.
I found the best place to overlook the entire island, and I'm going to check it out... Want to come with me? Things might feel completely different from a different viewpoint.
Good morning, Commandant...
What's up?
Creating a stable island in the sky might not be too challenging, but getting the right balance between beauty and practicality can definitely be tough!
In the resting areas, special silencing devices have to be used to dampen the noise from the flight engines... There are also gravitational forces and safety facilities to be considered...
—Commandant Dumbass, are you even listening? This level of intricate design can only be done by my Engineering Force! So, how about giving me a well-deserved compliment?
Every time summer arrives, I have to adjust my frame's cooling system. It's the most annoying part!
Especially during summer, the building materials will all get scorching hot, not good at all for construction.
But since you're on vacation, fine... I'll adjust the cooling power and join you for a walk—purely because I want to see the seagulls. Who says I'm going to wear a dress?!
Oh, you're leaving already...? Just so you know, I'll be quite busy myself later!
Are you going to take Nanami out? Let's go!
It looks like so much fun here! Over there too! But where's the control room? Nanami wants to speed up more!
Adding a cannon would be great! Can we get Power one of them? Can we?
Reeeally... It's a pity that we can't have Power modified, but Nanami will still get the job done! Onto the next mission: Sneak into the control room!
Nanami likes summer because there's so much fun, but actually, Nanami thinks everything is fun.
Moreover, Nanami is the strongest in summer! Because Nanami is the strongest whenever! Huh? Oh, so you just like summer itself.
Alrighty! I'm going to challenge the sun next! Power ready! Let's go! I'm just kidding. I think I'll have more fun hanging out with Commandant.
No more playing? Nanami will always be here!
Shh... Don't tell anyone I'm here. I don't want to be recognized...
No one would expect... to see me here, right...? It's okay. I won't let people see through my disguise...
But... let's just talk here... You'll fall if you get too close to the edge... It's better to stay in a safe spot.
Now that I think about it, coming all the way here and then having to figure out how to get back is a bit of a hassle... How about you give me a ride back? Then, I won't have to worry about hiding.
When it comes to summer, many would want to go swimming... I never had the chance to learn it before becoming like this...
I don't need to learn it anymore. I can hide underwater whenever I want now... and no one will ever notice...
What I'm trying to say must be different from what you think about swimming... Hm? Oh, I never really talk to fish.
Want to run away...
Hello, Commandant.
This place has a lot of business potential... From my personal perspective, it appears feasible to run Akdilek stores here.
...Are you asking about my own feelings? I like this place. It's close to the sky, and the sky... feels free, different from the universe, and it's quiet here.
If we're talking about being with you, I also feel safe... Commandant, that area seems to be an ideal location for a deli.
I have hazy memories of summer. The train was always... unbearably hot, and people would often suffer from heatstroke. If it became too scorching, it would significantly impede the progress of work.
I really enjoy having ice cream. If we place the ice cream machine here, we can have some together.
Does this count as my attempt to learn how to take care of others...? If you come to buy ice cream, I'll offer it to you at a cost price.
Commandant, until next time.
Is there anything I can help you with, Commandant?
Summer in the Arctic region is not as cold as people would imagine. Have you ever walked on a tundra, Commandant?

There are a lot of creatures out there. Commandant, have you ever come across Arctic foxes? I once saw a pack of them while they were hunting... They looked adorable running around. Some of the braver ones would even bark in the direction of the Forest Guards.
Whether it's on land, in the sky, or out at sea, everyone is giving their all in their own lives. When you have the time, let's visit my hometown together, Commandant.
Continue to stay in mid-air in a floating place...? It feels kind of strange. The island also looks a bit lonely in the air...
But I already got used to this kind of life. Going through hardships can make one more open-minded about life.
My apologies! I didn't mean to burden you with my ramblings... Commandant, what would you like to do next? Want me to give you a quick ride? It's pretty nice to fly through the sky.
See you, Commandant.
Hm? Oh, it's you, Commandant. I'm patrolling my territory.
The ground is so far away... I'm not afraid of falling, but it's not safe for you to stay here.
Where's Noctis? If it's him, I can kick his ass however I want. It would be even better if I could throw him down from here.
I guess this counts as part of my territory patrol. I've got it all understood, Commandant.
Summer means going out and having fun... but I don't know who to be with besides Vera and Noctis. Hm... I can play by myself too.
Hm? You want to play with me, Commandant? But I don't know any games for two people. The only two-player game I'm good at is "kicking ass."
But I don't want to kick Commandant's ass. Commandant is a good person. A good person can share snacks with me.
Time to say goodbye? Goodbye, Commandant.
Happy New Year! Are you also here with a "mission"?
Jamilah told me about this Kowloong tradition of making "New Year Purchases". She asked me to visit you and do some shopping, then bring the goods back.
But what exactly classifies as "New Year Purchases"? Food? Daily products? Is this lamp one of the New Year goods? It looks very delicate. Could it be expensive...?
Oh... Are you getting it for me? Thanks.
Little League is having a gathering in a few days. I'd like to get some "New Year Purchases" for them. Could you help me pick something?
Food should do the trick, right? I just realize this stall sells sweet cakes, but that stall sells spicy ones. How weird.
Guess I'll just buy a little bit of everything. What flavor do you prefer? I can get one for you too.
Let's check that stall over there. What are they selling?
Oh, hello. Happy New Year and wish you a great fortune!

Shopping takes more skill than you would think. First, you need sharp eyes to pick out the best goods. Then, you also need to know how to haggle... Look, there's a stall ahead. Let me show you how it's done.
Got it? This is how you bargain: slash the price in half, then work your way up bit by bit.
You've never seen such a low price, have you? You should try bargaining next time. It saves quite a bit!
The crew members on the Eternal Engine want to celebrate the festival too. Come along!
As the old saying goes, it's a fresh new start after the Spring Festival. A new year always brings new hopes, so this year is bound to be better, right?
In the upcoming year, I'm sure we'll be able to establish more trade zones, connecting more people and regions together... Just thinking about it already makes me so excited!
Oh, you're leaving already? Goodbye! Don't forget the bargaining tips I taught you!
Hello, Commandant. Wish you all the best in the upcoming new year.
Commandant, I've heard of many strange things happening here—firecrackers setting off on their own, Nian beast attacks... Do Nian beasts really exist?
Whatever the case is, please follow the safety guidelines and set off firecrackers in the correct way. Also, stay alert for any unusual creatures...
Whew, I think that covers all the safety rules. Please stay safe during the holidays, Commandant.

I bought these gifts from a stall over there. Even if I told myself that I was "just browsing," after walking around, I couldn't help but think this would be perfect for Commandant, and that one would suit my sister... Before I realized it, I had already bought a lot.
Sister is helping me carry some of the stuff. She's right behind...
Sorry, sister! I bought too much!
Commandant, let's explore that area together when you have a break.
Why are you getting so close... do you have something for me?
What are they? Sweet dumplings? Fine, I'll try one...
Ouch, it's too hot! Get me that chilled electrolyte over there!
...It actually tastes not bad after I let it cool. The wrapper is soft and sticky; the fillings look normal but have a unique taste... Interesting.
You don't need to block them. I'm not cold. The snowflakes fall from the sky... they are clean.
It's a pity that they melt when they land on the table. Maybe I can make it colder to keep them longer...
Well, I probably should not. I'm afraid you won't be able to sustain that cold.
You can go first. I want to stay a little longer.
What are you doing here?
Is this the tea you bought to celebrate New Year? Why is the lid sealed so tightly? One sec... Alright, it's open now.
The Kowloong way of preparing tea can be intricate. I'm not good at it, but I wouldn't mind having tea in a simpler way here.
...Not bad.
New Year's wishes? I never make them. Wanting too many things is like holding sand—it will just slip through your fingers.
There are some things I'll never give up. As for the others, I won't go out of my way to chase them.
But if it's your wish... Maybe I'll help you make it come true if you tell me.
We will meet again.
What a coincidence. Fate has brought us together.
I like the way this stall is set up. I heard there's a... festival gala tonight? Do you need me to perform onstage?
I have actually prepared a stage play.
Of course, if you'd like, I can also give you a private performance. What do you think?
Family reunions? Very festive, but not for me. How about something more interesting?
For example, I could whisk you away and run to a place where no other Constructs can find us. That would be fun, don't you think?
Maybe I can perform the play I prepared? It's a dull, cliched, and meaningless comedy. Still want to see it? Hah, your choice never fails to surprise me...
Oh, what a brief encounter...
I hope no one can find me.
What are you doing? You've been all over the place. What, was I sneaking up on you? No... no way! I was just... enjoying the view! Right, the view.
Why are you here alone though?
I don't mind spending the time with you... if you don't have an appointment with anyone else.
"Abundance of Fish"... Eek, just looking at this dish's name already makes my tail hurt...
That being said, these fish are so tiny. If you really want to eat fish, I can catch some big ones for you...
You'll owe me a favor then... Never mind. Just remember to thank me later.
Are you leaving again...? Oh, you'll be back? Then I'll wait for you here.
Commandant, we have stepped into another new year together.
I often hear people say that time is a continuously flowing river, so nothing will change no matter how we celebrate the New Year.
But right now, with you and Gray Raven around, this day is more than just a festival—it is an anniversary of our time together.
Gray Raven had been through a lot this year, but nothing could stop us—stop me from reaching you.
Commandant, it's time to open gifts. The weather's still quite cold lately, so I picked a scarf for you.
I spent a long time in the store debating on the color. In the end, I chose red, because it was the warmest color.
As for the froggie on top... Sorry, it was my work...
I got a box of fireworks. Shall we head to the square right now?
Commandant, over here.
It's your turn, Commandant.
I bet you still have a few smaller cards in your hand. Are you sure you want to play a card this big now?
I lost... No, I didn't go easy on you. I just didn't expect that you'd play your cards in that way.
Wait, there's punishment? So I need to stick these papers to my forehead? Um...
One moment, Commandant. For the second time, the water needs to be boiled for fifteen seconds... Three, two, one. Alright, pass me your cup now.
I've been studying Kowloong tea art. According to the book, to achieve the best flavor, I must strictly control the brewing time.
Like the taste? Great, I will take note. We can replace some coffee with tea in future.
Come try another type of tea, Commandant.
Let's have some tea together.
I found this little heater. We can sit around it and bake some desserts.
Hmm... This time is a little different. I didn't prepare the desserts beforehand, because I wanted to make them with you while sitting around the heater.
Making something with you has always been my wish. I wished for it last year, and this year too.
Sitting here, we can see the blooming flowers simply by looking up.
Look, there's another white plum hidden over there.
I have always wanted to enjoy the blossoms in the courtyard with you, Commandant. Now, that wish has come true.
Could you pick a white plum flower for me, Commandant?
Have a seat.
Spring Festival is one of the most important festivals in Kowloong. Every year, people would return home during this time to reunite with their families and celebrate the arrival of a new year.
"Family" is a distant memory to me, as I can't really recall any other family members apart from you. But thinking about it, Kowloong is just like my second home.
This is more than enough for me.
You're right. After dedicating so much time to the reconstruction of Kowloong, maybe it's time for me to take a break.
We sit by the pond to enjoy some tea while listening to the snowfall and appreciating the flowers. That does sound like an excellent day.
Why not relax a little with me?
Have something to do? Alright, you should go then.
One, two... more stuff to put in my mini vault!
This year, I received a lot of red packets again. But I'm already a grown up...
Huh, why are you here? You didn't see anything, did you?
Why are you holding a red packet too? Is it for me? Um... I'll still take it! Thanks, Commandant!
Perfect timing, Commandant! There's an eating contest going on. Team up with me!
What's the contest about? Participants need to eat the food in every single stall on this street. There will be amazing prizes if we can finish the first!
Hey, don't turn me down. It's a Kowloong tradition! The more you can eat, the luckier you will be in the next year... Believe me, it's true!
Bye, Commandant! Let's try other street food next time!
Happy New Year, Commandant.
Ah, the Spring Festival of Kowloong... How nostalgic. It feels so wonderful to celebrate this day with you and Pulao.
Let's follow the tradition and set off some firecrackers! They will blast away all the bad luck in the past and bring us a brilliant new year as bright as the red wrapping.
The firecrackers will cast away all the gloom. Wish you all the best in the new year, Commandant.
In the past, I wasn't always able to celebrate this festival in such a peaceful way. But I would always prepare some food to share with my friends.
It's not exactly a Kowloong tradition, more of a personal habit. I just wish everyone could live the life they want happily ever after.
I made this dessert myself, Commandant. Would you like to try it?
May we all have a healthy and peaceful year.
Do you have any special plans today, Commandant?
Commandant? I'm not on any mission right now. Balancing life and work is an essential part of our routine. During holidays like this, we must rest to live and work better.

I'm reading "An Overview of Kowloong's New Year Culture and Traditions". Would you like to read it with me? It's full of interesting festive practices and traditions. I think you'd find it just as intriguing as I do.
Can you see it from my screen? Good, we can read it together.
We must not forget safety even on festive holidays. Are you thinking of taking a walk over there...? Would you like me to accompany you?
Before the festival, I considered many ways to protect you on such occasions, but none of them seemed as reliable as staying by your side.
We can get going if you don't mind.
Are you leaving for now? Sure. I'll wait for you right here.
Here you are, Commandant!
What's the most exciting part of Kowloong's New Year? Firecrackers, of course! I've got a huge box of them ready. Come on, Commandant!
Careful, I'm about to set them off! What did you say? I can't hear you... Opposite? What's opposite?
Whoa! Why are all the firecrackers flying out of the box? Watch out, Commandant!
See that pond over there? I have already checked it. There are fish inside!
But you know what? Wanshi sat there for hours but didn't catch anything! Hahaha!
He looked so pathetic, so I snuck under water, caught a big fish, and hooked it onto his line...
That still counts, right? Hehe!
Got something else going on? Sure. Just remember to come play with me later!
Hibernating. Please leave me alone... Hmm? Commandant?
Hmm, it's been quite busy these past few days. Seems like many people are making wishes here... Perhaps that's one of the Spring Festival traditions too.
But is it really going to bring them good luck at this point of time? I don't think I would rely on that to fulfill my own wishes.
Still, if you are willing to tell me your wish, it might actually come true today... Who knows?
I just finished a mission. It completely drained me, so I was going to ask for a long-term hibernation.
Right before that, Kamui told me about some interesting activities happening here, so I thought I'd come take a look...
I like fishing because it's quiet and peaceful. But... does this pond even have fish in it?
Are you leaving already? Hmm... alright then. Wake me up whenever you come back.
Come taste this, Commandant!
Have you tried the fish? I cooked it. For a fish this big, I need to put extra seasonings in the dish, so I added chili peppers and fermented black beans. How was it? Pretty good, right?
I read in a Kowloong book that during this festival, you must eat fish as it is a symbol of abundance...
Abundance year after year... Hmm, I guess it means we will always have plenty to eat? Doesn't sound too bad, huh?
Why do you still look so rushed...? Don't tell me you are still on missions! Does Babylonia not give commandants holidays?
No other missions, huh... Great, you really should take a rest today! Just wander around in the courtyard and slack off!
Remember, no working! I'll keep an eye on you right here!
Everyone is gathering together to celebrate... This feeling isn't too bad, I guess.
Come play with Nanami, Commandant!
Commandant, there was heavy snow last night. The ground is all covered in snow now, which makes it the perfect opportunity to build snowmen! Come on, I have already rolled a snowball.
Eyes, nose... all set. Let's name this one "Commandant"!
Wait, don't touch it yet. The carrot is still wobbly... Ah! Commandant's nose fell off!
Behold, this is Nanami's latest invention—the Super Snow Shoveling Machine! See, it can shovel away any amount of snow, even the stone pavements!
That being said, the shoveling machine's primary mission is—to scoop up Commandant!
Let's go, Commandant! You're spending the entire day with Nanami!
Nanami will take good care of "Commandant"!
I need to take note of more Kowloong traditions.
Here are the firecrackers I prepared. Please set them off, Commandant.

According to Kowloong's New Year customs, people set off firecrackers in order to drive away the Nian beast. While my database indicates no evidence of such a creature, my analysis of Kowloong's cultural traditions suggests that this activity envisions the repulsion of misfortune and the arrival of good fortune.
Therefore, please continue setting off the firecrackers. No need to worry about the possible debris it creates—I'll ensure the ground is promptly and thoroughly cleaned afterward.
Rest assured that my frame is functioning normally. The low-temperature environment won't affect me.
However, I've noticed that the temperature of your extremities is quite low... Do you need to go back and change into warmer clothing?
Alternatively, you can also hold my hand. I can set the temperature of my frame a little higher... Do you feel more comfortable now?
You may leave if you have other commitments. I will stay here and gather more information.
Oh? Are you here to say happy holiday to me?
I told you I would come today. See, right on time. Where's your gratitude now?
If you let me decide... How about spending the entire day here alone with me?
Boring? Spending time with you could never be boring. Or... are you suggesting you'd rather do something more "risky"? Hmph, I don't mind that either. I'll go along with whatever you want.
These desserts aren't bad at all. Especially this one... Why are you just staring at me? Take it. This one's for you.
Indulge yourself while you can. It's fine to be greedy. You won't have chances to enjoy delicate treats like these when you are on a mission...
Want another? Sure. Don't worry—no one would have the guts to mock you in front of me.
Alright, you should take a rest inside.
I prepared a lot of great stuff. You're going to love them!
I got some super amazing fireworks. Once you see them, you'll never forget them. Come on, let's give them a try!
Cough... How was that? Awesome, right?
These fireworks are heavily regulated because they are often mistaken for explosives... Wait, why is the edge of your clothes burnt?
I like this Kowloong festival! It's red everywhere. Before I realize, I have bought a lot of things. My wallet's probably all empty by now... Yep, there's barely anything left.
Did I buy too many things? It's just two packs of red couplet paper, one box of red "Fortune" character stickers, one hundred red paper cutouts...
This just isn't enough no matter how I look at it! I'll need to paste it all over the lounge!
Haha! I've got an even more powerful firework! Come find me secretly later!
Happy New Year, red packet please—Vera told me to say so.
The swing was fun, but No. 21 flew off the swing and landed on the grass across. Vera said No. 21 must not return to the lounge before cleaning the mud away... It's not that fun anymore.
But if you are willing to push No. 21, No. 21 would like to play again.
Higher... Higher! Roar! I'm flying!
No. 21 likes this festival. The air is filled with many comforting scents. No. 21 has collected all of them and can share with you.
This is a flower, it's fragrant. This is a snowflake, it has no smell... Oh, it has disappeared.
That's okay, I still have this one. It's a firecracker I just picked up... Why are you standing so far away?
There's no danger nearby. Why are you going back to get the protective suit?
Bambinata... likes this festival too.
Um, Bambinata's looking at the snowflakes...
Snowflakes fall from the sky onto Bambinata. They feel cold.
Bambinata doesn't feel cold because it's warm near Commandant. Could you stay with Bambinata a little longer?
Thank you for the New Year gift, Commandant. Bambinata will take good care of it...
Red packets? No, Mistress said Bambinata must not take them...
Bambinata knows this festival is a special one that only comes once a year. Bambinata will carefully preserve this memory about the New Year.
Thanks very much, Commandant.
Here you are, Commandant.
...Commandant? No, I'm not zoning out. Just sitting here for a while to appreciate the tranquil view.
I know a little about Kowloong's culture. Festivals like this always bring joy... Me? Of course I'm happy too. Seeing you here is another pleasant surprise.
Shall we go over there to take a look? The view there is unique and innovative. I think I've seen similar scenery in a Kowloong movie before...
It's snowing outside, Commandant. Let's move to the corridor. It'll be warmer over there...
Oh, is this the blanket I gave you earlier? Never thought I would see it here... Seems you like this gift.
...Could you sit a closer, Commandant? This will do. Now we can share the warmth together.
I look forward to seeing you again, Commandant.
Do you like this type of lantern, Commandant?
These floating lanterns are so delicate... Back in the Arctic, rivers were often frozen, so we never had the chance to make such beautiful lanterns.
But we did make ice sculptures occasionally. Have you seen ice sculptures before? Some of my skillful sisters could make truly impressive ones. They even had space inside for candles.
Hmm... If you are interested, how about I make one for you, Commandant? What shape do you like? Let me see... This piece of ice will do...
Why are they all staring at me...? Is it weird to eat ice cream in this weather?
I don't feel that cold. The good thing about this weather is that ice cream doesn't melt easily...
Would you like to try it, Commandant?
Would you like another ice cream?
I didn't expect to see you here.
Not working today? Of course I won't schedule any work on festivals like this. Or rather, my "work" for today is to sit here and have tea with you.
Phew... Finally, I don't have to deal with strange guys and idiots. I can just sit here with you, enjoying the snack...
What a wonderful day.
The Engineering Force's roster is a hopeless mess. Just looking at it already annoys me.

But it's okay. I have already reorganized all their forms. The new roster is as beautiful as my programming code. I even kicked the guy who made me work five days in a row for no reason out of the Engineering Force.
Times like this are meant to be thoroughly enjoyed. Hmm... Would you like another drink?
Remember to come back later. You haven't finished your tea yet.
Should I put more bait on?
Don't ask me where the fishing rod and bait came from. They were already here when I arrived.
Fishing is a game of patience, which I really lack. But I can't give up yet. I must not!
I'm sure I can catch something... Look, it's biting!
That railing at the corner was a sharp 90-degree angle. Bumping into it will definitely hurt a lot...
Good news is, the railing is gone. I just cut the corner off, and another Engineering Force member will come fix it soon.
Of course, someone has to be on duty. Even on holidays, the machines need to be maintained... I originally assigned myself to work several days, but someone changed the roster I made...
Well, never mind. A little rest like this feels quite good... Look! Something's biting the bait!
Look, I just caught another fish! Hooray!
I can use the buildings here as background reference for my comic...
I have captured most of the scenery here, but it still feels like something's missing on this painting...
Ah, Commandant! Perfect! Just stand right there—don't worry, you won't block the view.
Now the picture feels a lot more complete... This is exactly what I wanted! Next, I just need to add myself on it...
Rest assured that this painting will remain part of my private collection. I won't show it to others easily.
As for your "modeling fee"... How about I give you my best work?
Don't worry, I never make losing deals. Still, if you think I'm getting the short end of this deal... Why don't you give me one of your works next time?
Just draw anything you like, Commandant!
Goodbye, Commandant. I'm going back to my "work mode" too!
Hello, Conductor.
I have briefly visited many places and seen many flowers in bloom.
But none of them look so elegant yet simple.
Could you play a piece with me, Conductor? I want to capture this moment with you through music.
Are the lanterns and screen walls open for visitors to leave their messages?
I can compose the melody we just played. Would you like to write it down?
The ink left here is a proof of our time together. It will sway in the wind, whispering the story we left behind for many years to come.
I wish we can linger a little longer in this serene moment...
There are many things to do...
The Oasis has an abundance of supplies this year. Spring Festival is an important day for many Forsakens, so we prepared a lot of "New Year goods."
While it is impossible to cater to everyone's tastes, I hope they all can leave this festival with wonderful memories.
Would you like to spend this festival with us? I can take you back to the Oasis once I finish my business here.
Now is indeed a good time for a casual chat. Is there anything that troubles you, or makes you happy? Feel free to share them with me.
Want to hear my stories? Hmm... I don't mind, but it will probably take a long time. It's been a long journey.
Are you willing to take your time to listen to them?
No need to rush. I'll wait for you here. We can continue when you come back.
Happy New Year, Commandant.
They say if you write down your New Year's wish on a lantern, it might come true...
Hmm? Curious about what I wrote?
I can tell you my wish if you are willing to tell me yours... how about that?
The snow here has always been so tranquil. We only associate it with snowmen or New Year, nothing else.
Stay here and take a walk with me if you are still curious about that question you asked me.
Hold on, Commandant... There's snow on your hair.
